What is Cascade50?

Cascade50 transforms your Sage 50 data into insightful, vibrant and easy-to-use dashboards.

Gain an insightful and vibrant view of your business with an extensive library of intuitive and easy-to-use dashboards that cover everything from sales to finance and purchasing.
